entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his shaggy appearance. He is armed with a crossbow in this scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends and classmates at Hogwarts. She is perplexed by Hagrid's plan to enter the forest.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story and a student at Hogwarts. He follows Hagrid into the forest with Hermione.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a centaur who teaches Divination at Hogwarts. He left the forest before this scene.

relationships.description: Hagrid enters the forest with Harry and Hermione, who are following him.
Hagrid is armed with a crossbow as he enters the forest.
Harry follows Hagrid and Hermione into the forest, who are also following him.
